en.text:
Iâ€™m a {{Python Backend Developer}} specializing in [[API-driven systems]], [[cloud-deployed services]], and [[automation-heavy workflows]]. My work focuses primarily on backend architecture, with practical experience integrating AI, data pipelines, and infrastructure-level tooling.

Iâ€™ve built and maintained production systems using [[FastAPI]] and [[Flask]], worked with {{NLP}} and {{LLM-based pipelines}}, and deployed scalable services using {{Docker}}, {{Linux}}, and {{cloud platforms}}. This background allows me to move comfortably between backend logic, data processing, and system optimization.

Iâ€™m always open to collaborating on projects that value correctness, scalability, and well-reasoned engineering decisions.
